hero.title: Overcoming HIV: Hope Rises Between Two Red Lines
hero.description: Two Filipinos come to terms that they will live with HIV for the rest of their lives—then find hope and meaning in their journey.

primary.lead: Impeachment complaints Against VP Sara Duterte
primary.title: COA: OVP spent P375 million in ‘confidential expenses’ in 2023 | ABS-CBN News
primary.description: The Office of the Vice President used a total of P375 million in confidential expenses for 2023, the Commission on Audit said in its report.

secondary.title: OVP travel expenses more than double in Sara Duterte’s first full year
secondary.description: Bulk of the expenses — almost 69% — were for local travels, which increased to P31.43 million in 2023 from P18.62 million in 2022

secondary.title: 'Betrayal of public trust' alleged in first impeachment complaint filed vs VP Sara Duterte
secondary.description: Various sectoral groups, including families of extrajudicial killing victims, filed an impeachment complaint against Vice President Sara Duterte on Monday, December 2 at the House of Representatives.

secondary.title: 2nd complaint presses VP Duterte on P125M spent in 11 days
secondary.description: Manila, Philippines — Accusing Vice President Sara Duterte of committing what they described as the highest form of treachery through betrayal of public trust by misusing and abusing confidential funds

carousel.title: PH, Indonesia sign agreement on transfer of Mary Jane Veloso
carousel.description: The Philippines and Indonesia on Friday, Dec. 6, signed an agreement for the transfer of convicted drug courier Mary Jane Veloso back to her home country.

carousel.title: Philippines, China trade accusations on new South China Sea confrontation
carousel.description: China and the Philippines gave conflicting versions on Wednesday of a maritime confrontation around a contested shoal in the South China Sea, the latest row in a longstanding dispute between the neighbours.

carousel.title: American Kidnapped in Philippines Is Believed to Be Dead, Police Say
carousel.description: The police said they believed Elliot Eastman, 26, from Vermont, was killed during the abduction in October. They cited testimony from a suspect in custody.

carousel.title: Philippines: Three dead and dozens sick after eating sea turtle stew
carousel.description: At least 32 people in the Philippines were admitted to hospital after consuming the endangered species.
